title: Chrome Extension configuration
description: A higher level configuration of Chrome's manifest.json for webpack to convert to manifest

options.description: Path to jsx/tsx file for options page, relative to `src/`

sidepanel.description: Path to jsx/tsx file for sidepanel page, relative to `src/`

background.description: Paths to background or service worker scripts, relative to `src/`

contentScripts.description: Content scripts (with options) to be included in certain pages

urlMatches.description: URL matches to run content script

name.description: Name of the resulting content script file

path.description: Path to the source content script, relative to `src/`
